document.full_text: hewlett-packard co on wednesday sued a former high-ranking executive who had left to join rival oracle corp to stop him from sharing hundreds of documents hp claims he stole from the company.
document.title: hewlett-packard sues former exec at oracle
lines_and_colors: hewlett-packard co on wednesday sued a former high-ranking executive who had left to join rival oracle corp to stop him from sharing hundreds of documents hp claims he stole from the company.
